briefTitle: Efficacy And Safety Evaluation of Glepaglutide in Treatment of Short Bowel Syndrome (SBS)
officialTitle: A Phase 3, International, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Glepaglutide in Patients With Short Bowel Syndrome (SBS)

arms.label: Glepaglutide SC injections once weekly and placebo once weekly

summary:
The primary objective of the trial is to confirm the efficacy of glepaglutide in reducing parenteral support volume in patients with short bowel syndrome.

Glepaglutide is the International Nonproprietary Name and USAN for ZP1848.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Weekly Parenteral Support (PS) Volume

effectByArm.arm: Glepaglutide SC Injections Once Weekly and Placebo Once Weekly
